thread.title: Who does Rutgers miss most? Kyle Flood, Leonte Carroo, Darius Hamilton, DBs? (POLL)
thread.title_full: Who does Rutgers miss most? Kyle Flood, Leonte Carroo, Darius Hamilton, DBs? (POLL) | NJ.com

author: Dan Duggan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Who does Rutgers miss most? Kyle Flood, Leonte Carroo, Darius Hamilton, DBs? (POLL)
text:
PISCATAWAY â€” If you had been told before the season that Rutgers would be without its head coach, best offensive player, best defensive player and four top defensive backs for most of the first four games, you likely wouldn't have believed it.
But that implausible scenario has unfolded during the first third of the season, as the program has been hit by a perfect storm of adversity. Rutgers has dealt with suspensions , arrests and season-ending injuries to vital members of the team in a three-week span.
Click through the gallery above for a recap of the prominent missing pieces early in the season for the 2-2 Scarlet Knights. Then vote for the biggest loss and sound off in the comments section to explain your choice.
Dan Duggan may be reached at dduggan@njadvancemedia.com . Follow him on Twitter @DDuggan21 . Find NJ.com Rutgers Football on Facebook.
